page.title: 13CHILDREN AND RECREATION(2)
page.content: In Barlby we have five play areas where we can play on swings,slides and round-a-bouts or just play ball games. Some children belong to the 1st Osgodby Scouts and Guides who meet in a hut behind the Methodist Chapel each week. There is a Youth Club at the High School which meets on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.Each night is for a different age group between eleven and eighteen years old. In the Summer months we can go swimming at the open_air pool at the High School. For children under five years old there is a Playgroup every morning at the Chapel. There is a pond behind Northfield where children go fishing. When not playing out with our friends we spend our time watching television.
